document.full_text: unlv hired byu associate coach dave rice as its head basketball coach sunday, picking him to return to the school where he was an assistant under four head coaches for 11 seasons.
document.title: b.y.u. assistant rice hired as u.n.l.v. basketball coach
lines_and_colors: unlv hired byu associate coach dave rice as its head basketball coach sunday, picking him to return to the school where he was an assistant under four head coaches for 11 seasons.
